messages.subject: more chibi art
messages.msgSnippet: Hello people I ve taken the liberty of uploading into the Photos--- Illustrations section a colorized bit of chibi art courtesy of my resident artist Child #2.
messages.messageBody:
Hello people

I've taken the liberty of uploading into the Photos--->Illustrations
section a colorized bit of chibi art courtesy of my resident artist
Child #2. It depicts the rather sad end of the era but it's kind of
cute...

Barb Sheridan
